meanings.sent1: I saw the kids lumping their toys together in a big pile.

meanings.sent3: The animals were lumping together for warmth on the cold night.
meanings.sent4: The clouds were lumping in the sky, creating a dramatic scene.
meanings.sent5: The students were lumping their ideas to create a group project.
